creditline: Gift of Daniel Greenberg and Susan Steinhauser
description: abstract image; muted pigments of pink, green and peach mixed with bright yellow, orange, blue and green; small white splatters throughout; yellow and orange blob surrounded by green pigment in lower right quadrant; scrape marks throughout
markings: LLC in pencil: AP II/III | LLC impressed in paper: RW
medium: Archival pigment print on Epson Ultra Smooth Fine Art paper
signed: LRC in pencil: R Weingarten | LLC on back in pencil: PALETTE SERIES: RICHARD ARTSCHWAGER #1, 2005
title: Palette Series: Richard Artschwager #1
